translated: Verses of the Elders🔽The Collection of Ones
He who has crossed over the army of the king of death,
Like a great flood a weak reed fence,
The victor, indeed, is one who has gone beyond fear,
The one who is tamed, who has attained Nibbāna, who is steadfast.

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā bhalliyo thero gāthaṁ abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmā bhalliyaḥ theraḥ gātham abhāsittha ati
translated: Thus have I heard. This was said by the Elder Bhalliya.
